name: Cooking Blast - Restaurant Foodie Express
description:
COOK and BAKE food to SERVE customers in your restaurant of Cooking Blast.

You are the cooking chef in the kitchen and need to cook Indian food, African food, Japanese food, Chinese food and many more in the best food game. Time to get your kitchen gear ready and start baking.
If you like cooking games this restaurant game will give you a blast!

In Cooking Blast restaurant foodie express you make many different dishes for your clients.
Prepare the food by cook, bake and grill it and serve it to your customers.
Every Island in this game stands for a country which has his own restaurant with very traditional and recognizable dishes and flavours.

The kitchen is full with ingredients and kitchen gear which you can upgrade to speed up your cooking time!

Features of Cooking Blast:
🍙 Indian food, Chinese food, Japanese food, African food, French food and more
🍚 Many dishes like Chicken Tikka Masala, and more to find in all the different kitchens
🍛 Learn time management so the food does not burn
🍜 Enjoy the best cooking games for free
🍣 Upgrade your kitchen gear for speeding up your cooking time
🍤 Bake, Cook & Grill and become the best chef of the world!
🍞 Great game for kids to learn how to cook food and own a restaurant
🍗 Cook delicious meals from all over the world in this popular cooking kitchen craze game

Do you love playing food games? This free cooking game is all about Indian food, chinese food, japanese food and different other dishes from all over the world. Take care of your customers by baking meals and serving people their order. Collect rewards, upgrade your kitchen and unlock new worlds!
Don’t forget to let us know which country you want to see in the future in this easy to play kids cooking kitchen craze game!
